timeline.message: Add default impls of SPI classes

Merge pull request #1859 from dagnir/spi-impl

Add default impls of SPI classes
Add apache HTTP request stats

Merge pull request #1863 from dagnir/apache-metrics

Add apache HTTP request stats
Add setup code for API call metrics for sync

Merge pull request #1872 from dagnir/core-metrics

Add setup code for API call metrics for sync
Collect HTTP/1 metrics in NettyNioHttpClient.
Support core metrics for sync clients

Merge pull request #1882 from dagnir/core-metrics-pt2

Support core metrics for sync clients
Add metrics codegen changes for async clients

Added support for HTTP/2 metrics to Netty.

Updated existing HTTP metrics to specify that they are "concurrency", not "connections". For HTTP/2, we can't calculate the maximum number of connections, and concurrency is more useful to customers anyway.

Fixed the AVAILABLE_CONCURRENCY in Netty to actually be the number of established but idle concurrency, not the difference between max concurrency and leased concurrency.
Support core metrics for async clients
Add functional and unit tests to verify async core metrics for event streaming operation

Add tests for MetricUtils

Follow-up on review comment on #1882

Merge pull request #1906 from dagnir/metric-utils-test

Metric utils test

Minor metrics fixes

 - move ServiceId and OperationName reporting into try block
 - ServiceName -> ServiceId
 - Fix typo in test
Additional tests for IOException for core metrics
Add CloudWatchMetricPublisher, a MetricPublisher implementation that uploads metric data to CloudWatch.
Fixed a cloudwatch-metric-publisher issue where very small values would result in a failure calling cloudwatch.
Merged mainline to metrics development branch
Add HttpClient collector to HTTP request

Merge pull request #1923 from Quanzzzz/sdk-metrics-development-2

Merge mainline to metrics development branch

Mutiple metrics fixes

 - Allow lists of publishers to be set.

   Allow setting of metric pubishers to be set on the client of request override
   rather than a single publisher, making using multiple MetricPublishers per
   client or request easier.

 - Remove any non-core usage of MetricUtils.

 - Fix metrics test in TranscribeStreamIntegrationTest.

 - Fix Async API call metric stage to add the duration in a separate
   CompletionStage.

Updated metric publishing to address internal review comments.

Also fixed an issue where multiple parts of the SDK were ignoring the "alternate" request ID.
Add Preview annotations for metrics related classes/methods
Update CW Publisher to PREVIEW
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into sdk-metrics-preview
Update metrics module versions
Update metrics module versions

timeline.bodyText: Should we return whenComplete's result, so that it's easier to say that "when the execute future completes, metrics have been published"?
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: We might want to consider supporting these, so that enabling the "NoOpMetricCollector" won't cause all of the SDK calls to fail with UnsupportedOperationException.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Do we use this? Why not just let the caller use valueClass().cast(o)?
timeline.author: millems

See the License for the specific language governing + * permissions and limitations under the License. + */ + +package software.amazon.awssdk.metrics; + +import java.util.Set; +import software.amazon.awssdk.annotations.SdkPreviewApi; +import software.amazon.awssdk.annotations.SdkPublicApi; +import software.amazon.awssdk.metrics.internal.DefaultSdkMetric; + +/** + * A specific SDK metric. + * + * @param The type for values of this metric. + * + * NOTE: This is a Preview API and is subject to change so it should not be used in production. + */ +@SdkPreviewApi +@SdkPublicApi +public interface SdkMetric { + + /** + * @return The name of this metric. + */ + String name(); + + /** + * @return The categories of this metric. + */ + Set categories(); + + /** + * @return The level of this metric. + */ + MetricLevel level(); + + /** + * @return The class of the value associated with this metric. + */ + Class valueClass(); + + /** + * Cast the given object to the value class associated with this event. + * + * @param o The object. + * @return The cast object. + * @throws ClassCastException If {@code o} is not an instance of type {@code + * T}. + */ + T convertValue(Object o);

replies.bodyText: Sure this can be removed, don't think it's used at the moment
replies.author: dagnir

timeline.author: millems
millems

timeline.bodyText: Worried about this being used when collect() and newChild() throw exceptions.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should do ~= since this function disregards small, constant time factors.
timeline.author: millems

timeline.bodyText: I noticed we updated V1 from milliseconds to nanoseconds. Should we just do nanos instead from the beginning for V2?
timeline.author: millems

timeline.message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into sdk-metrics-preview
Update versions to match latest SNAPSHOT in master
Add announcement blog post
